review: Best product I've used in a very long time. The interface is extremely snappy and the device allows a great deal of user control. I am a big fan of the way Amazon has allowed 3rd party apps to be installed. It's as simple as using an android app called "apps2fire" to copy over your favorite android apps to the big screen. I've installed Firestarter launcher that brings up all my third party apps at a doubletap of the home button. Not only can I watch my favorite shows, but I also have my favorite classic Nintendo / Sega games to play. All packed into a stick that could fit on a keyring. Unbeatable price point. Getting a chromecast / roku over this beauty would be a mistake.
author: Jesse Fleming
